title: Mike Trizna
text: Hey there. I’m a data scientist with a background in bioinformatics, but a recent focus on the application of AI to museum collections, and teaching others best practices around data and AI.

title: Writing practice
text:
I’ve come to realize that my writing skills – whatever they were – have atrophied quite a bit, and I want to use the “opportunity” of my government shutdown furlough to practice writing.

Hopefully setting up this personal website and blog provide the right balance of technical tinkering to tickle my brain, while also giving me a space to write a little something every couple of days.

title: Open Mike
text:
Writing practice








Oct 16, 2025


Mike Trizna
